column4: can anyone to tell me how to do when i resume my pc from lock screen or screen saver to ask me for password ?
hwo to do to ask for password after lock screen ?
Allocate screensaver there are options there to enable password and duration it takes for the desktop to auto lock.
Depending on which version and window manager you are using. If you are using Unity go to application lens "Super + A" and type screensaver.
